title: CDC & Federal Health Data Removal, 2025 (USA)
mechanism: Executive orders and internal agency directives to remove webpages and datasets, and to remove content relating to gender identity, public health topics, HIV, DEI, etc.
impact: Loss of public access to critical health data, removal of documentation and codebooks, interruption to academic and medical reference systems.
sources: KFF: A Look at Federal Health Data Taken Offline (2025)
CIDRAP article on CDC page removal
Guardian: Judge orders CDC & FDA to restore webpages
